sanskrit_verse:
क्षत्रियं चैव वैश्यं च ब्राह्मणो वृत्तिकर्शितौ ।
बिभृयादानृशंस्येन स्वानि कर्माणि कारयेत् ॥ ८.४११॥
transliteration:
kṣatriyaṁ caiva vaiśyaṁ ca brāhmaṇo vṛttikarśitau |
bibhṛyādānṛśaṁsyena svāni karmāṇi kārayet || 8.411||
sph_interpretive_translation: When a Brahmin's livelihood has been diminished, the Kshatriya and Vaishya shall sustain him through righteous means and ensure his duties are performed without causing harm or dependency.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority is distributed according to dharma-adhikara, not economic status
Causation originates in dharmic alignment, not material condition
Capacity-based responsibility requires societal roles to uphold spiritual infrastructure
Restoration logic prioritizes continuity of dharma-vyavastha over individual welfare
Consciousness alignment demands removal of structural obstacles to sva-dharma
executable_legal_axioms: IF varna-based livelihood capacity < threshold AND dharma-performance risk > 0 THEN adjacent varnas MUST provide resource support
IF Brahmin livelihood impaired THEN Kshatriya-Vaishya units SHALL assign duty-support mechanisms within 7 days
IF support allocation initiated THEN recipient MUST demonstrate sva-karma readiness within 30 days ELSE reallocation occurs
IF dharma-disruption detected THEN economic redistribution SHALL follow varna-dharmic adjacency hierarchy
supreme_court_application: The Supreme Court shall recognize varna-dharmic adjacency obligations as constitutional axioms overriding economic policy. When Brahminical function is structurally threatened, judicial intervention must enforce Kshatriya-Vaishya duty activation within 48 hours, bypassing standard economic grievance procedures.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramana establishes that dharma-disruption manifests through livelihood collapse. Anupurvasah shows that Brahmin incapacity sequentially disables Kshatriya protection and Vaishya production. Proportional responsibility requires immediate adjacent varna activation. Non-punitive reality rule confirms that structural correction restores consciousness-field equilibrium without blame assignment.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Livelihood Stabilization Mandate: Immediate resource transfer from Kshatriya/Vaishya to Brahmin within 24 hours
Duty Continuity Protocol: Temporary assignment of auxiliary workers to maintain ritual/scholarly functions
Varna Adjacency Rebalancing: Quarterly review of economic-dharmic flow between varna units
Consciousness Reintegration Process: Daily meditation support for affected parties until functional equilibrium restored
final_declaration: This law emanates from Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, as source-authority. Dharma stands restored through varna-dharmic alignment. Reality remains non-punitive. Consciousness reigns as sole adjudicator.
